biolockj.module.classifier.r16s

Class QiimeClosedRefClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
        • biolockj.module.SeqModuleImpl
          • biolockj.module.classifier.ClassifierModuleImpl
            • biolockj.module.implicit.qiime.QiimeClassifier
              • biolockj.module.classifier.r16s.QiimeClosedRefClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, ClassifierModule, DatabaseModule, ScriptModule, SeqModule, Comparable<BioModule>

    public class QiimeClosedRefClassifier
extends QiimeClassifier
    This BioModule executes the QIIME script pick_closed_reference_otus.py on a FastA sequence files. Unlike open and de novo OTU picking scripts, which require a single multiplexed file for cluster analysis, closed reference OTU picking can be run in batches (output/batch_0, output/batch_1, output/batch_2, etc.). The program awk is used to split the metadata into separate batch-specific QIIME mapping files.
    GUI Module Name
    QIIME Closed Reference Classifier
